name: Trial by Salt
description:
A game made by me and 5 friends as part of a 30 hour game jam at Forsbergs University, Sweden. 

Proof of concept, and somewhat clunky. Cool idea, though. :)

Credits:

Isac Selander - 3D

Joel Hellman - 3D

Jon Astrup Hällkvist - 2D

Eliott Holmqvist Lennstrand - Design

Josef Dominguez Marrero - Design & Programming

Axel Marelius - Design &  Programming
